sentences.en: Currency-conversion costs remain one of the biggest obstacles to cross-border trade.
sentences.cn: 货币兑换成本仍是跨境贸易的最大障碍之一。

sentences.en: He is to remain in the hot seat as chief executive.
sentences.cn: 他将继续留在公司总经理这个不好坐的位子上。

sentences.en: He will have to remain in hospital for at least 10 days.
sentences.cn: 他至少得在医院里呆10天。

sentences.en: In absolute terms British wages remain low by European standards.
sentences.cn: 根据欧洲标准，英国工资的绝对值依然很低。

sentences.en: It'd be better for a place like this to remain closed.
sentences.cn: 像这种地方最好一直关闭。

sentences.en: Little of the original building remains.
sentences.cn: 原来的建筑已经所剩无几。

sentences.en: Major questions remain to be answered about his work.
sentences.cn: 关于他工作的许多重要问题仍然悬而未决。

sentences.en: Many academics remain unconvinced of the need for change.
sentences.cn: 许多学者仍怀疑是否有变革的需要。

sentences.en: Many home sellers remain stuck in a recessional rut.
sentences.cn: 许多房屋的卖主仍然陷在经济衰退的困境中。

sentences.en: Please remain seated until all the lights are on.
sentences.cn: 请留在座位上，直到灯全都亮起。

sentences.en: she has broken her leg, but it remains to be seen how badly.
sentences.cn: 她把腿摔断了，但有多严重还有待了解。

sentences.en: The $40 million-a-month aid payments will remain on ice.
sentences.cn: 每月4,000万美元的援助款项将继续搁置下去。

sentences.en: The boy remained silent .
sentences.cn: 男孩依然默不作声。

sentences.en: The editor's decision is final and shall evermore remain so.
sentences.cn: 编辑的决定是最终性的，而且应该永远不会改变。

sentences.en: The government remained in control.
sentences.cn: 政府继续控制着局势。

sentences.en: The precise details of the origins of life remain hidden.
sentences.cn: 生命起源的确切详情仍是个谜。

sentences.en: The refugees were allowed to remain in the UK.
sentences.cn: 难民获准留在英国。

sentences.en: The score is tied, with fifteen minutes remaining.
sentences.cn: 比赛还剩15分钟，双方比分持平。

sentences.en: The three men remained silent.
sentences.cn: 这3个人保持沉默。

sentences.en: These resorts, like Magaluf and Arenal, remain unbeatable in terms of price.
sentences.cn: 像马加拉夫和阿雷纳尔这样的度假胜地，在价格方面仍具有绝对的优势。

sentences.en: They remain stranded in freezing weather and rapidly worsening conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然被困着，天气严寒，情况迅速恶化。

sentences.en: They were cleaning up the remains of their picnic.
sentences.cn: 他们正在打扫野餐的残余物。

sentences.en: To remain together was like volunteering to be flayed alive.
sentences.cn: 再要呆在一起就好像自愿被活活剥皮一样。

sentences.en: Unless these questions are solved, the region will remain a powder keg.
sentences.cn: 除非这些问题得到解决，否则该地区会一直是个火药桶。

sentences.en: We remained friends.
sentences.cn: 我们依然是朋友。

sentences.en: What remains of his original art collection is now in the city museum.
sentences.cn: 他当初那些艺术藏品中得以保留下来的部分现在都在市博物馆里。

words.tran_cn: [数] 余数，残余；剩余物；其余的人

phrases.tran_cn: 保持冷静，保持镇静；面不改色

trans.tran_en: Theremainsof something are the parts of it that are left after most of it has been taken away or destroyed

trans.tran_cn: 保持不变，继续存在，仍需去做，停留，剩下
trans.tran_en: to continue to be in the same state or condition
to stay in the same place without moving away
